title: Porsche Previews Next-Gen CarPlay
content:
Remember last year at WWDC, when Apple previewed the next generation of CarPlay, with support for screens that span the entire dashboard? Here’s a MotorTrend report on the 2024 Porsche Cayenne SUV. Slide 2 shows a CarPlay interface that spans the entire dashboard.

 ★
author: John Gruber
